Package it.polito.dp2.FDS

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FlightInstanceReader
    Gives read-only access to some information about a flight instance
    FlightMonitor
    FlightMonitor is the entry point to get information about flight information
    FlightReader
    Gives read-only access to some information about a flight
    PassengerReader
    Gives read-only access to some information about a passenger registered for a given flight
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Aircraft
    Includes some basic information about an aircraft model.
    FlightMonitorFactory
    Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain one or more objects implementing the FlightMonitor interface.
    Time
    Represents a read-only hh::mm time Hours range from 00 to 24 and minutes from 00 to 59
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FlightInstanceStatus
    Represents the status of a flight instance
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FlightMonitorException
    Thrown if an implementation of FlightMonitor cannot be created
    MalformedArgumentException
    Exception used to signal that one or more arguments have invalid formats
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    FactoryConfigurationError
    Thrown if the implementation of the concrete factory is not available or cannot be instantiated.
